title: My Personal Man
description: The year is eighteen twenty two and for most part the world is still untouched by the interfering hand of man. A young Australian man from a very hard working family has a burning ambition one day to own his own boat and go on a voyage of adventure into the Tasmanian Sea, unfortunately it turns into disaster.He is washed up on a small Island in the Micronesia area where this story really starts. He is believed by the people of this island to have been sent by the spirit Gods.A young girl that has been banished from her Island is sent to a much smaller fragment of land a few miles from the main Island to live alone, she finds him and cares for him.She and her people have never had contact with the outside world. Never seen a white face, or heard a different language.This is her story.
author: Jeffery P. Coit
